Sinhala Basic Change History
====================

1.2.1 (2023-12-1)
----------------
* Add Noto Serif Sinhala font to package

1.2 (2021-06-14)
----------------
* Added tablet layout

1.1 (2020-03-09)
----------------
* Keyman keyboard generated by ImportKeyboard from Windows 10 

1.0 (2009-05-15)
----------------------
* Initial Desktop import from Windows Vista
